subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Patience paid off for the Colorado Avalanche, who signed their 39-year-old captain, Joe Sakic, to a one-year, $6 million contract after he decided to play a 20th season in the N.H.L. Sakic missed 38 games last season after having a hernia operation.
